txt.en: By the breath of Hrímil Frost-heart, the gates of Gundabad were sealed shut. If the Dwarves of the Gabil'akkâ intend to enter the sacred mountain, they shall first have to overcome the towering wall of ice that separates them from their prize.\n\nYour mission is to repel the Frost-horde and attempt to breach the ice sealing the gates of Mount Gundabad.

By the breath of Hrímil Frost-heart, the gates of Gundabad were sealed shut. If the Dwarves of the Gabil'akkâ intend to enter the sacred mountain, they shall first have to overcome the towering wall of ice that separates them from their prize.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath at Akrâz-zahar.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'A few of our scouts were able to approach Mount Gundabad, and they were fortunate enough to escape the notice of the Frost-horde. It seems the many of Hrímil's brood have begun to roost near the wall of ice encasing the gates of the mountain. It is true that Prince Durin wishes to gain entry to Gundabad, but such a task comes with great risk.

'You are to travel to the gates and attempt to breach the ice preventing the Gabil'akkâ from entering Mount Gundabad. Do not remain there longer than you must!'
The monster commander in this mission will attempt to summon blizzards.
Your mission is to repel the Frost-horde and attempt to breach the ice sealing the gates of Mount Gundabad.\n\nYou should talk to Vorthur Smokebreath and travel to the gates of Mount Gundabad.
'I appreciate your efforts, [placeholder].\n\n'It will take time to breach the wall of ice outside Gundabad, but once we do, the mountain shall be ours once more!'
